title: IMU Leadership 2023 – 2026 | International Mathematical Union
snippet: ICMI EC Ex-officio Member (IMU Secretary General) France · *CoP was formerly known as the Committee on Electronic Information and Communication (CEIC). Terms of membership are staggered. Ilka Agricola · CoP Chair 2023 – 2026 · Germany · Jean-Pierre Bourguignon ·

title: IMU Awards, Prizes, and Special Lecture | International Mathematical Union
snippet: The IMU Executive Committee appoints - for each of its prizes and awards - a selection committee in accordance with the individual prize or award statutes, and the IMU By-Laws. The names of the selection committee members remain confidential until the ICM at which the awards are made, only the names of the chairs are made public. An overview of previous selection committees can be found on the individual prize or award webpage.
